review:
I have always relied on Dr. Jayanthi for the health of my parents. Her diagnosis is to the point and only recommends treatments or procedures when it is necessary.

I live in the North of India, but I make it a point to travel to chennai once in six months to get a health checkup done. She is also quite famous in the northern regions among the medical fraternity here.

My relative had met the doctor and it was for health problem. ********* *** **** ** ******* I can surely recommend doctor to others. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Gastric doctor was recommended later. Diet was suggested.
We met doctor on Friday for my husband. She clearly explained . Very polite. She listens patient problems and give the solutions. I recommend her. Very nice person

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
**** **** ****** *** much satisfied treatment

Strict procedures
And review time

The Appointment was for me I had been with an surgery recently so related to that I had been to the hospital the doctor is very good actually friendly in nature understands the problem . The medication were prescribed. I am satisfied with the consultation. I would like to recommend the doctor to others.
she listens to the patient and understands well and explains the treatment. she listens really well
